collection.quote: I’m a new Christian and this is my first experience of reading the Bible in one year… I look forward to hearing/reading it each day.
My favourite way to start the day.
My heart leaps every morning when I see Bible in One Year by Nicky Gumbel sitting in my inbox.
I’ve been looking for an app like this for many years…
Fantastic resource. Combines inspiring stories from everyday life and history with spiritual wisdom drawn from the Bible. It is uplifting, challenging and humorous.

collection.quote: 每天早上，只要看到收件箱里有甘力克的邮件，我的心情就会特别好。
collection.source: 达利尔.塞斯，敬拜带领人

collection.quote: 多年来，我一直在寻找像圣经日日行这样的APP.....
棒极了！充满圣经真理和智慧，又有来自日常生活的真实经历，还有历史伟人的箴言和轶事。《圣经日日行》充满幽默、令人振奋，带给人启发和挑战。
